      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
      int lane,
      int mode,
      org.opencv.core.Scalar color)
        Constructor: Creates a Player for a lane, mode, color and a name. Creating an integer-representative of players color.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player.
        lane - The lane on which the player drives.
        mode - The game mode the Player plays.
        color - The color of the player
